item.title: Error installing latest R version (3.4.0) on Windows
item.description: UPDATE: R 3.4.1 does not have this problem so you can install that version instead If you’re getting the following error when you’ve installed R 3.4.0 on Windows, you’re not alone. Error in if (file.exists(dest) && file.mtime(dest) > file.mtime(lib) && : missing value where TRUE/FALSE needed The R team have released a patched version but right now it’s a little difficult to find out about. If you need/want the patched version, it’s available at:
